on.t:
prep. 在...之上
adv. ...上去
a. 正起作用的
[计] 打开

on a cash-on-invoice basis.t: [经] 按发票现金付款方式

on a diet.t: 按规定进食,进规定的饮食

on a mission.t: 带着使命执行任务的时候

on a pad.t: 在一片荷叶上,在印台上

on a razor's edge.t: 在锋口上, 处于十分危险的境地, 在危急关头

on a regular basis.t: 经常; 例行的; 有规律的

on a row of stumps.t: 在困难中, 处于窘境

on a scheduled basis.t: [经] 按照预定日程的方式, 暂不付款, 帐款结算

on a silver platter.t: 不图回报地（给予），拱手相让

on a trial basis.t: 在试验的基础上, 试验性地

on a walk.t: 步行,散步,在散步的时候

on all four.t: 匍匐,爬着;完全相似的,完全一致的

on all fours.t: 匍匐, 完全一致\n[法] 完全一致

on an individual basis.t: 基于个人来说……\n在个体的基础上

on an irregular basis.t: [网络] 在不规则的基础上

on application.t: 一接到申请,一接到请求,一经索取

on approbation.t: 商品供试用的, 包退包换的

on approval.t: 商品供试用的, 包退包换的\n[经] (商品)供试用, 包退包换

on arrival.t: [经] 到达货物相抵后净额

on balance.t: 总而言之\n[经] 相抵后净额

on blast.t:
to embarass someone or to make someone look stupid
> "I heard you told Jay he had bad breath in front of the whole class"
> "Yeah, I put him on blast"

on board.t: 在船/车/飞机上, 在公共交通车辆上\n[经] 已装船

on board securities.t: [经] 上市证券, 交易所挂牌证券

on both sides of the fence.w: on both sides of the fence

on call.t: 随叫随到的, 待命的, 即期支付的\n[经] 叫价时

on camera.t: 在摄制中, 在电视摄像机前

on carrier.t: [经] (货柜运输)陆地承运, 转运

on cloud nine.t: 非常愉快,高兴,欣喜若狂,忘乎所以

on commission.t: 抽取佣金\n[经] 受托代销, 以委托代办形式

on consignment.t: 以寄售方式\n[经] 受托, 寄销, 托销寄售

on credit.t: [经] 赊帐, 赊欠买卖, 信用交易

on deck.t: 在甲板上, 准备齐全, 下一个将轮到的\n[经] 甲板上

on deck risks.t: [法] 舱面险, 甲板装货险

on draught.t: 桶装的, 随时可以从桶里汲出的

on duty.t: 值班, 上班\n[化] 值班

on easy terms.t: 以宽厚条件, 以分期付款方式\n[经] 以宽厚的条件

on edge.t: 竖着, 紧张, 急切

on every possible occasion.t: 在一切场合,一有机会就…

on faith.t: 不加怀疑地, 未经核实地

on file.t: 存档\n[法] 存档, 归档

on fleek.t: A work used by uncultured idiots.\n> I am stupid, so I say on fleek.\n

on going.t: adj. 不间断的，进行的；前进的\nn. 前进；行为，举止

on ground of.t: 以…为根据,以…为理由,因为…

on grounds of.t: 以...为理由, 以...为借口, 根据...

on hand.t: 在手头, 即将发生, 待处理, 在场\n[化] 有现货的

on hire.t: 雇用, 出租\n[经] 供出租用

on his understanding.t: 根据这个条件, 在此条件下

on hold.t: 等着通电话; 暂缓; 推迟; 搁置

on installment.t: 分期付款,以分期付款的方式

on its merits.t: 根据是非曲直,根据其长处

on liking.t: 受到试用的,正在试用的

on line.t: [经] (与主机)联机, 在线, 机内

on line operation.t: [化] 在线操作; 在线工作

on margin.t: [经] 凭保证金额度(购买证券)

on merits.t: [法] 按其是非曲直, 按实情

on my shit.t: Meaning that you're you. No mistakes and you are on guard. You take care of yourself.\n> Hey man, you okay? Yeah man, I'm on my shit.\n

on oath.t: 发誓, 在誓言的约束下\n[法] 发誓

on offer.t: 削价出售的, 供出售的\n[经] 出卖

on one's ass.t: 穷困潦倒, 处境艰难, 毫无希望

on one's beam-ends.t: 人经济十分窘迫, 计穷智尽

on one's feet.t: 站立着, 恢复健康, 警觉地

on one's holidays.t: 在休假中, 在度假, 过假期

on one's last legs.t: 垂死, 即将失败(崩溃、破产等)

on one's own.t: 独自地, 独立地, 主动地

on one's own account.t: 为自身利益, 靠自己\n[法] 自负其责, 后果自负

on one's own ground.t: 在家, 在行, 内行

on one's own hook.t: 独自地, 自做自当地, 自担风险地

on one's own terms.t: 根据自己的主张, 按照自己的条件\n[经] 照自己的定价

on one's toes.t: 警觉的, 准备行动的, 作好行动准备的

on order.t: 已定(购)而尚未交货的\n[经] 已定购而未交货

on pain of being barred.t: [经] 以不得行使权利为制裁

on paper.t: 以书面形式, 在名义上

on par with.t: 与…平分秋色; 与…势均力敌，不分上下

on pension.t: 靠养老金生活,领取退休金

on persentation.t: [经] 提示即付, 在出示时

on point.t: to be perfect; to satisfy; whatever it was, it met the person's standards\n> "Damn, that chicken was on point!"\n

on probation.t: 作为试用, 察看, 缓刑\n[经] 作为试用, 试用期间

on purchase of.t: 在购买某物时,在购买…方面

on rare occasions.t: 难得, 不常, 偶尔

on record.t: 记录在案, 在历史记录中\n[法] 在案

on sale or return.t: 无法销售可退货\n[经] 准许退货买卖

on sb's behalf.t: 代表(某人), 为了(某人)

on sb's coattails.t: 依靠别人, 叨某人的光

on sb's mind.t: 压在某人心上, 挂在心上, 担忧, 惦念

on sb.'s behalf.t: 代表某人, 为了某人

on sb.'s head.t: 四脚朝天, 报应到某人

on second thought.t: 进一步考虑后,重新思考后,转念一想

on second thoughts.t: 进一步考虑后\n[法] 经仔细考虑之后

on shares.t: 分担盈亏\n[法] 分摊盈亏, 分摊

on spec.t: 投机地,带着投机的心理,碰运气

on standby.t: 随时准备行动, 处于待命状态; 等退票（或余票）

on stilts.t: 踩着高跷, 夸张做作

on stream.t: 进行生产\n[经] 投产, 在产, 在流转中

on successive occasions.t: 在接连不断的时候;接二连三地

on sufferance.t: 经默许, 被容忍\n[法] 出于容忍, 出于宽容

on tap.t: 可随时使用\n[化] 上栓

on target.t: 击中要害的, 准确的：完全准确的、精确的或有效的

on that.t: [网络] 关于该发明；意思是收到；美国卡车司机常用的暗语

on that account.t: 由于那一点,因此,有鑑于此

on that point.t: [网络] 在那方面同意某人；在那方面同意某人的；说到这点

on the alert.t: 警惕着, 防备着\n[法] 戒备, 留意

on the anvil.t: 在制作中,在讨论中,在编辑中

on the average.t: 平均而言; 一般来说;  通常; 平均来讲

on the ball.t: 机警的, 勤奋的, 高明的

on the beach.t: 在海滩上, 失业的, 潦倒的

on the blink.t: 奄奄一息,濒于死亡;坏了,失灵

on the books.t: 已注册的, 记录在案的\n[法] 载入名册, 有记载, 有案可查

on the brink of.t: 在…边缘,濒于,接近,几乎,差点

on the bum.t: 过流浪生活, 失修, 处于破损状态

on the button.t: 击中下颔, 准确, 确切, 准时

on the carpet.t: 在被考虑中, 被训斥

on the contrary.t: 正相反\n[法] 正相反, 相反地

on the crest of the wave.w: on the crest of the wave

on the cross.t: 对角, 不老实, 不光明正大地

on the danger list.t: 被列入病危者名单;病情危急

on the docket.t: 在进行中, 在考虑中\n[法] 在审理中, 在审查中, 在执行中

on the dodge.t: 无固定住处以逃避拘捕

on the dot.t: 准时地, 在指定的空间点上

on the edge.t: 边界状态：处于不稳定的状态; 激动; 兴奋：处于高度兴奋状态; 如由危险或冒险引起的

on the edge of.t: 濒于, 几乎, 在边缘

on the Erie.t: 竖耳听着, 在偷听, 不冒险下手, 藏匿着

on the face of it.t: 从表面判断, 乍看起来\n[法] 从表面判断, 乍看起来

on the fair road to.t: 一路坦途,大有实现…的希望

on the fence.t: 抱观望态度, 保持中立

on the flat.t: 在纸上,在平面图上;在平地上

on the floor.t: 在发言;在讨论中,在拍摄中

on the fly.t: 在飞行中, 不工作, 闲混

on the foundation.t: 由基金会提供资金,领取基金会提供的奖学金

on the fritz.t: 坏掉了, 坏掉了的, 有故障, 有故障的

on the ground.t: 在地上, 当场\n[法] 当场

on the ground of.t: 以...为理由\n[法] 以...为理由, 以...为籍口

on the high ropes.t: 自高自大, 趾高气扬

on the inside.t: 在里面, 在内车道上, 知道内情

on the knee of the gods.t: 尚未可知的,尚未可定的

on the knees of the gods.w: on the knees of the gods

on the legit.t: 在合法范围之内, 正当的

on the level.t: 诚实的/地, 真实的/地, 公平地, 坦率地, 不耍花招

on the lips of.t: 在...中流传, 出自...之口

on the loop.t: 在匆匆的旅行中,在作穿梭访问

on the loose.t: 散漫, 行动不受限制, 放荡

on the move.t: 在活动中, 在发展, 活跃

on the muscle.t: 以暴力,凭蛮力;气势汹汹地

on the news.t: 根据新闻报道,从新闻报道中

on the nod.t: 默许, 赊购\n[经] 赊购

on the outskirts of.t: 在…的郊区,非…的核心部分

on the pad.t: 在路上,在流浪;拦路抢劫;受贿

on the part of.t: 就...而言, 在...一边, 由...表现出来的, 由...所经历的, 由...所作出的\n[法] 就...而言

on the quiet.t: 秘密地\n[法] 秘密地, 私下地

on the rack.t: 在受折磨,苦恼的,焦虑不安的

on the radio.t: 从收音机中,用无线电,通过广播

on the ragged edge.t: 危如累卵;在穷困的边缘

on the road.t: 在旅途中, 在...过程中

on the rocks.t: 触礁, 毁坏, 破产

on the ropes.t: 倒在栏索上, 处于困境, 濒于失败

on the shake.t: 参与(敲诈、勒索等)犯罪活动

on the strength of....t: 受...的鼓励, 依赖..., 凭借...

on the wane.t: 正在减少, 逐渐衰落

on the warpath.t: 在作战,在斗争,非常气愤

on tiptoes.t: 踮着脚尖；用脚尖；急切地, 热切地, 翘足企盼地

on top.t: 在上面, 成功, 领先, 另外

on trial.t: 在试验中, 在受审\n[法] 受审

on9.t:
Vulgar
Used in Hong Kong
Pronunciation: "on-gau" ("on" in English, "9" in Cantonese)
Meaning: stupid, thinking stupid
More: [on99]
> Chief Exceutive Mr.Tung: If China is good, Hong Kong will be good. When Hong Kong is good, we are good too.
> Citizen A: He's on9.
> Citizen B: He's on99.

oneitis.t:
Often confused with love, this is the feeling that a particular woman is actually special. This is just an illusion; she is the same as the other three or so billion. "Go fuck ten other women" is the most commonly prescribed treatment for this "disease" (hence the "itis"), as it tends to show quite quickly how very alike people are.

In other words, get over yourself and your obsession with that girl, because it's just an illusion. And when you get rejected, don't be depressed. Because there's really not much to worry about.
> Dude, you definitely have oneitis for that girl. You've been talking about her nonstop for the past week. Don't you realize she's nothing special, and that you are just being fooled? Snap out of it so you won't be so depressed when she rejects you!

See also [wheels of steel]\n> Tonight we've got DJ Judge Jules playing live on the ones and twos, live on BBC Radio One.\n

Onew Condition.t:
A condition which a member of SHINee has. Named after the leader of SHINee, Lee Onew (Lee JinKi), the condition is quite contagious. If you are crashing into random things, tripping over your own feet, craving for chicken, or making lame jokes that make the atmosphere awkward, you might just have this condition. There is no cure for this condition, but it might warm your heart that you aren't the only person who is suffering from this condition.

This condition was first named when fans of SHINee, known as Shawols, noticed that Onew kept making cute mistakes. At first they thought that it was very cute of Onew, but as time passed, they began to suspect that Onew was doing this for fanservice, and began to worry that he would hurt himself. His fellow members, Key and Jonghyun, have confirmed that this condition is real, and that Onew is not acting.
> Onew Condition is really cute to see.
> I hope that Onew won't hurt himself because of his Onew Condition.

Onision.t:
Best known for his videos on YouTube. Onision makes comedy sketches, music videos, activist vlogs & prank videos.

Due to the most popular music video he's ever created being "I'm A Banana" (which has over 30,000,000 views) he refers to his audience as "Bananas".

Onision has made videos on YouTube since late 2007.
> [youtube] [actor] [comedian] [onision] [lol]

Only used a couple times.t:
"Only used a couple times" is an expression that literally translates to "used the fuck out of it and am selling it while I can for a few bucks before it breaks." The phrase is extremely common on Craigslist and Facebook yard sales. Oftentimes, after buying something that has "only been used a couple times," you will get maybe a couple of good uses out of it before it breaks/stops working/ignites and by the time you've gone through the hassle of scrapping it, you'll be wishing you would've just bought a friggin' new one from the start.
> "I bought a popcorn popper that was "only used a couple times" and the damn things spits out half the seeds."
> "I'm not sure why the washing machine makes loud humming noises. The person I bought it from said it was "only used a couple times."
> "I bought a Glock that was "only used a couple times," and the slide flew off when I shot it and nearly impaled my right eye."
